name: LoreBook
body:
Uses Text to Speech so you can listen to your favorite champions lore while you play LoL!
18 Languages available :

English, 
Korean, 
Spanish, 
French, 
German, 
Italian, 
Polish, 
Greek, 
Romanian, 
Japanese, 
Portuguese(Brazil), 
Russian, 
Turkish, 
Thai, 
Vietnamese, 
Indonesian, 
Chinese(China), 
Chinese(Taiwan)

Please send errors/suggestions to :
g1op3t3321@gmail.com


Disclaimer :

Lore for League of Legends isn't endorsed by Riot Games and doesn't reflect the views or opinions of Riot Games or anyone officially involved in producing or managing League of Legends. note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
